template.name: gzn_parent_view
template.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:id="@+id/parent" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent">
<include layout="@layout/widget_bg" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="0dp" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent"/>
<androidx.core.widget.NestedScrollView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="0dp" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" android:fillViewport="true">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical">
<com.google.android.material.appbar.AppBarLayout style="@style/MyAppbarLayout" android:background="@color/white">
<com.google.android.material.appbar.MaterialToolbar style="@style/MyMaterialToolbar">
<LinearLayout android:gravity="center" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content">
<ImageButton android:id="@+id/btn_back" style="@style/MyCostumToolbarImage" android:src="@drawable/mygzn_keyboard_arrow_left" android:tag="CostumToolbarImage" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_toolbar" style="@style/MyCostumToolbarTitle" android:text="MyCostumToolbarTitle" />
<ImageButton android:id="@+id/btn_popup" style="@style/MyOptionMenu" android:src="@drawable/mygzn_more_vert" /> </LinearLayout> </com.google.android.material.appbar.MaterialToolbar> </com.google.android.material.appbar.AppBarLayout>
<View style="@style/MyDivider.Toolbar" />
<LinearLayout style="@style/MyParentType">
</LinearLayout> </LinearLayout> </androidx.core.widget.NestedScrollView> </androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

template.name: gzn_MyRadioGroup
template.value:
<RadioGroup android:id="@+id/rg_$id$" style="@style/MyRadioGroup" android:checkedButton="@+id/rb_first">
<RadioButton android:id="@+id/rb_first" style="@style/MyRadioButton" android:text="MyRadioButton" /> </RadioGroup>

template.name: gzn_var_live_data
gzn_start_binding_ac
gzn_start_binding_fun
gzn_init_fr_oncreate
gzn_init_ac_oncreate
gzn_rv_item
template.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content">
<androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:id="@+id/cv" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginLeft="@dimen/def_margin" android:layout_marginTop="@dimen/def_margin_half" android:layout_marginRight="@dimen/def_margin" android:layout_marginBottom="@dimen/def_margin_half" app:cardCornerRadius="@dimen/radius">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_margin="@dimen/def_margin" android:orientation="vertical">
</LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView> </LinearLayout>

template.name: gzn_rv_init_adapter
gzn_tv_content
template.value:
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="@dimen/space" android:orientation="vertical">
<TextView style="@style/MyTextContent.Small.Grey.Light" android:text="$hint$" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_$id$" style="@style/MyTextContent" android:layout_marginTop="5dp" android:text="$hint$" /> </LinearLayout>

template.name: gzn_adapter
gzn_single_image
template.value:
<LinearLayout android:layout_marginBottom="@dimen/def_margin" android:layout_marginTop="@dimen/def_margin" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:gravity="center" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/img" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:scaleType="center" android:src="@drawable/ic_baseline_add_a_photo_24" />
</LinearLayout>

template.name: gzn_parent_view_single_foto
template.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:id="@+id/parent" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="0dp" android:fillViewport="true" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical">
<com.google.android.material.appbar.AppBarLayout style="@style/MyAppbarLayout" android:background="@color/white">
<com.google.android.material.appbar.MaterialToolbar style="@style/MyMaterialToolbar">
<LinearLayout android:gravity="center" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content">
<ImageButton android:id="@+id/btn_back" style="@style/MyCostumToolbarImage" android:src="@drawable/mygzn_keyboard_arrow_left" android:tag="CostumToolbarImage" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_toolbar" style="@style/MyCostumToolbarTitle" android:text="Single Foto" /> </LinearLayout> </com.google.android.material.appbar.MaterialToolbar> </com.google.android.material.appbar.AppBarLayout>
<View style="@style/MyDivider.Toolbar" />
<LinearLayout style="@style/MyParentType" android:gravity="center">
<LinearLayout android:layout_marginBottom="@dimen/def_margin" android:layout_marginTop="@dimen/def_margin" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:gravity="center" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/img_foto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:scaleType="centerInside" android:src="@drawable/ic_baseline_add_a_photo_24" />
</LinearLayout>
<Button android:id="@+id/btn_simpan" style="@style/MyButtonContained" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:text="Ambil Foto" /> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout> </androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

template.name: gzn_radio_button
template.value:
<TextView style="@style/MyTextHeader" android:layout_marginTop="0dp" android:text="Pilih Product Category" />
<com.gzeinnumer.dr.DynamicRadioButton android:id="@+id/dr_" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="@dimen/def_margin_half" app:style="@style/def_radioButtonStyle" />

temp_pendingdata

gzn_parent_view_v2
template.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:id="@+id/parent" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent">
<include layout="@layout/widget_bg" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="0dp" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="0dp" android:orientation="vertical" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent">
<com.google.android.material.appbar.AppBarLayout style="@style/MyAppbarLayout" android:background="@color/white">
<com.google.android.material.appbar.MaterialToolbar style="@style/MyMaterialToolbar">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:gravity="center">
<ImageButton android:id="@+id/btn_back" style="@style/MyCostumToolbarImage" android:src="@drawable/mygzn_keyboard_arrow_left" android:tag="CostumToolbarImage" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_toolbar" style="@style/MyCostumToolbarTitle" android:text="MyCostumToolbarTitle" />
<ImageButton android:id="@+id/btn_popup" style="@style/MyOptionMenu" android:src="@drawable/mygzn_more_vert" /> </LinearLayout> </com.google.android.material.appbar.MaterialToolbar> </com.google.android.material.appbar.AppBarLayout>
<View style="@style/MyDivider.Toolbar" />
<LinearLayout style="@style/MyParentType">
</LinearLayout> </LinearLayout> </androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

gzn_parent_view_dialog
template.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:id="@+id/dialog_canvas" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@drawable/rounded_corner" android:gravity="center" android:orientation="vertical">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_margin="@dimen/def_margin" android:orientation="vertical" tools:ignore="UselessParent">
</LinearLayout> </LinearLayout>
